description: Durable, warm lumberjack shirt in thick flannel wool blend with G-1000 reinforcements at the shoulders and pocket flaps. The fabric combines the insulating properties of wool and the durability of polyester, which creates a comfortable winter garment that can keep you warm even when wet. Comfort fit and bellows at the yoke for increased mobility. Buttons in the front, two buttoned breast pockets.
name: Fjallraven Granit Shirt - Mens
